document.full_text: the u.s. treasury does not plan to start selling its remaining shares in general motors co  until august at the earliest, after the automaker's second-quarter financial results, people familiar with the matter said.
document.title: treasury won't sell gm shares before august: sources
lines_and_colors: the u.s. treasury does not plan to start selling its remaining shares in general motors co  until august at the earliest, after the automaker's second-quarter financial results, people familiar with the matter said.
